result.execSummary:
The defendant Beth M. Mittelstadt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property (Over $2500), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(2)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: DOC COLLECT- Prison wages to go to restitution
PAY DIRECT TO CLERK OF COURT, ANY BOND APPLIES

Maintain sobriety. No bars/taverns where principle sale is alcohol, no possession of knife or any weapons, no contact with any known drug users or dealer. No contact with D.F. or C.F or their residence. No contact with K.B or her residence.

Defendant, Beth M. Mittelstadt, in custody, appeared with Attorney John M. O'Boyle.  Prosecuting attorney Andrea Amidon Nodolf.  Defendant in custody.  Kim Silvius - Clerk
(10:08)  MULTIPLE CASES HEARD.
State - filed Restitution Worksheet - requests court not rely on compass evaluation
State - calls Carrie Anderson addresses the court

*State argues over $52,000 restitution requested (worksheet filed) - submits 6  photographs of home - K.B. requesting $29,000 rest. - submits 5 photographs of weapon, violent force & damage deft did - requests prison sentence:  14CF397 - 1 1/2 yrs IC 2 yrs ES - pay rest $57,560.80,  $518 cc - n/c w/Dean or Cheryl Ferry or residence E6838 St Hwy 170, Colfax, WI & n/c Katie Bundy or her residence --- 15CF01 Ct 1 - 7 1/2 yrs IC 3 yrs ES - consecutive to 14CF397 - pay $518 cc, n/c w/William Anderson and residence (State will provide address) --- Ct 3 - 5 yrs IC 2 yrs ES - consecutive to 14CF397 & 15CF1 Ct 1 - $518 cc - n/c w/Todd Kurtzhals --- total prison 14 yrs IC 7 yrs ES 

*O'Boyle - argues sentence - submits letter from Deputy Pyka on deft's programs participated in & completed - not exceed the recommendation of PSI and have an imposed and stayed sentence and probation

*Defendant makes statement - Mr. O'Boyle reads statement

***(11:19) COURT:  addresses both counsel and defendant
14CF397 - Prison: 3 1/2 yrs - 1 1/2 IC, 2 yrs ES concurrent to 15CF1 Ct 2 & 3
$518 fine ($268 cc & $250 surchg) - PAYMENT PLAN
maintain sobriety and no bars/taverns where principle sale is alcohol, no possession of knife or any weapons, no contact with any known drug users or dealer - submit dna  sample
Restitution: $57,560.80 (worksheet submitted) - prison wages to go towards restitution
n/c w/Dean & Cheryl Ferry or their residence E6838 St. Hwy 170 Colfax, WI & n/c w/Katie Bundy or her residence
eligible for Challenge Incarceration and Substance Abuse Program

15CF1 Ct 2 - Prison:  10 yrs w/7 yrs IC 3 yrs ES  concurrent w/14CF397
$518 fine ($268 cc & $250 surchg) - PAYMENT PLAN
n/c w/ William Anderson and his family and their residence (State will provide address)

15CF1 Ct 3 - Prison:  10 yrs w/ 7 yrs IC 3 yrs ES concurrent w/14CF397 and 15CF1 Ct 2
$518 fine ($268 cc & $250 surchg) - PAYMENT PLAN
n/c w/Todd Kurtzhals

Credit 322 days
ineligible to vote and possess firearm and body armor prohibition
from Atty. O'Boyle re: sentencing and transcript documents  - - note: pictures scanned are best quality available
Correspondence on what Attorney O'Boyle will be discussing on his closing arguments

Deft - correct statement

          15CF1 Ct 3 - pleads - no contest)  waives rights & JT

***Orders PSI ***

DISMISS:  15CF1 Ct 1 & 4, 15CM1  Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 29, 2015 at 08:30 am.
